[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/OS-macOS-blue.svg?longCache=True)]()

#### Installation
```bash
$ [sudo] pip install mac-app-kill
```

#### Scripts usage
```bash
usage: app-kill app ...
```

#### Examples
```bash
$ app-kill  "VLC" "com.apple.iTunes" "/Applications/iBooks.app"
```
